card.desc:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Add above 30 tasks to the To Do List.
2. Scroll to the bottom of the list.
3. Change the filter view from â€œAllâ€ to â€œActiveâ€ or â€œCompletedâ€.
4. Observe the displayed content.

Expected result:

The system should reset the scroll position to the top when the filter is changed so that users can immediately see the relevant tasks.

Actual result:

The system retains the scroll position at the bottom, which may make it appear as though no tasks are displayed, causing user confusion.
card.name: Filter -> incorrect Scroll position After changing view Filter
Filter -> incorrect Scroll position After changing view Filter

old.desc:
Steps to reproduce :

1. Create a new task with the title â€œahmad  mohammad  saad â€œ(including multiple space between the words.
2. Save the task and observe how it displayed in the list.
3. Edit the task and check how title appears in the input fields.

Expected result :

The task title should display the same that providing include the spacing in both view and edits modes.

Actual result :

in view mode, only a single space appears between each word, but in the edit mode there is multiple space between each word.
